Trading Places

By: Mailed on: March 03, 2012

Dear , ,

Giancarlo Esposito and Eddie Murphy, Trading Spaces, 1982

Giancarlo Esposito as Gus Fring, Breaking Bad, 2011

Dear Giancarlo Esposito, Cellmate #2 in Trading Places

I am sorry for just now, merely 10 minutes ago when my girlfriend totally called it, realizing how far you’ve truly come.

Yours Always,
Cory
